sentences.sentence: She is always so chic, so elegant.
sentences.translation: 她总是那么时髦，那么优雅。

sentences.sentence: Her gown was very French and very chic.
sentences.translation: 她的礼服是地道的法国风格，非常时髦有品位。

sentences.sentence: Sony has cornered the market in chic-looking MP3 players.
sentences.translation: 索尼已经垄断了时尚MP3播放器市场。
